ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: CHECK CENTURY TRAVEL SERVER SET REMOTE ACCESS CONFIGURATION FOR ADMINISTRATOR RESTORE TBS DATA AND TEST ON WINDOWS XP 32BIT (FOR DOS PROGRAMS) AND WINDOWS 7 64BIT FOR ACCOUNTING SYSTEM

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: FINAL TESTING ON CENTURY SERVER & DATA - NETWORK TESTING FOR SECURITY AND CONFIGURATIONS

ProjTable.Name: MCKINLEY JIMENEZ
ProjTable.Job_x0020_Desc: S/57712 - SUPPLY & INSTALL SERVER - CHECKING OF CABLES AND DEVICES. SETTING SERVER IP TO 192.168.0.2 - SETTING SERVER NAME TO `//TBS_SERVER/TBSYS` - PERFORM PING TESTS - USER CONFIGURATIONS - CREATION OF WS1, WS2, WS3, WS4, WS5, WS6 ON SERVER WITH STANDARD PASSWORDS - ON-SITE RECONFIGURATION OF WORKSTATIONS. WS2 IS A NETWORK CONNECTED PC ONLY USED FOR NETWORK SHARING OF LQ-590 PRINTER SET ON BATCH FILE FOR DOS SYSTEM PRINTING. THEREFORE SET BOSS'S PC TO CONNECT AS WS2 INSTEAD. (SAVED ONLY AS CREDENTIALS) - WS7 ON AH PING'S PC. RECONFIGURE USERNAME TO WS6 TO MATCH SERVER REQUIREMENTS. - WS5 IS VERY OLD PC THAT IS RARELY BEING USED. STILL RECONFIGURE IN CASE OF FUTURE USES. - USER TESTING OF DOS INVOICING SYSTEMS & TBS ACCOUNTING SYSTEMS - INSTALL TV ON SERVER - INSTRUCT BACKUP
